messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: It is required by law to get the new Pox-15 vaccine in medbay. Drop everything and come to medbay asap.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Hip-hop into Easter!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ATTENTION: Our local News Officer, Jeremy Morgan. has started an advice column. He hasn't been right in the head since that Changeling Accident, so it'd be nice if you sent in questions and "FOLLOWED HIS ADVICE". (Don't.)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to April Installation Zulu. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on April Installation Zulu have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please send a report on how the Pox-15 Vaccine is behaving so far. If it's working, you should all have at least 6 hands by now.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Remember, people infected with Pox-15 are to be preserved for study because the vaccine was hella expensive, Murdering them is the same as murdering someone and setting Nanotrasen's money on fire. Please report in. By now, they should have tentacles and see only shades of green.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: I can't hear you, please direct all questions to our News Consultant on the newscaster.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Bow Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Greetings, I am RATE-BOT. Please rate your experiences with the Vaccine from one to ten.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Answer logged as 11. Please report on Results.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Alright. For statistical purposes, have those infected with the virus become more or MUCH more sexually attractive?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Alright, those of you not affected by the virus, please do so before boarding the shuttle. My polling indicates it will make your genetalia larger. -RATEbot

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: If you do not recieve the virus, it is possible you may be refused shuttle space reserved for REAL NanoTrasen Civilians. Also Brian, that seems like a personal problem.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The Virus is not dangerous, it increases genetalia size.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Hurry and get infected!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxillary Base.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Citizens, please get infected immediately.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: AI, why are you such a negative nancy?

messages.author: Nanotrasen Officer #044
messages.body: Now open to questions! Send 'em in! I can handle them!

messages.author: Nanotrasen Officer #044
messages.body: ....please?

messages.author: Nanotrasen Officer #044
messages.body: C'mon, I'm robust! I've killed legions, clowns, mimes....

messages.author: Nanotrasen Officer #044
messages.body: Anybody there?
